mapper.update: update t_permission set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pId = #{pId}, url=#{url}, iconId=#{iconId}, navCode=#{navCode}, orderId=#{orderId}, style=#{style} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t.id,t.code,tp.navCode as p_navCode,t.pId,t.navCode,t.description,t.iconId,ti.code as iconCode,t.url,t.orderId,t.style from t_permission t LEFT JOIN t_permission tp on tp.id=t.pId LEFT JOIN t_icon ti on ti.id=t.iconId
